reviews.text: This is a basic apartments and definitely DOES NOT merit silver crown from RCI.
reviews.title: First Class!!

reviews.text: The apartments are clean and the staff very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Beware when you book

reviews.text: The pools are barely heated and jacuzzi not hot. For the indoor pool, need to purchase bathing caps for 6 euros(bring your own).
reviews.title: 5 clubs but not all the same

reviews.text: The beds were surprisingly comfortable. The kitchen very old looking. You need to pay for your electicity and your safe per day. No dryer , so everyone hangs their clothes outside.
reviews.title: Not what expected

reviews.text: Have walked by Crown Resorts on many previous visits to Calahonda so thought we'd try it on this occasion. Apartment extremely well appointed, tastefully decorated and immaculately clean. The whole complex is beautifully maintained and the staff helpful and courteous. The quality of food on offer is above average and the evening entertainment worth trying. The complex is situated close to all local amenities and we would recommend it to all age groups.
reviews.title: Calahonda

reviews.text: stayed over xmas.would recommend without a doubt.great appartment and loads for kids to do.we stayed at calahonda which was a good base to explore.try to visit ronda if you can.the views are amazing.
reviews.title: great

reviews.text: If you like a Spanish flavor, with American comfort, this is a wonderful place. The top floors with their view of the ocean is reason enough to come to Spain. Their cafe serves excellent food, they have a great staff, the rooms are spacious, lovely tile, comfortable and clean.
reviews.title: Wonderful complex
Great service, very clean
reviews.text: Awesome, quiet and quaint 2 bedroom, 2 bath apartment on the hillside. It is part of the Crown Resorts Chain. Marble floors and tile bath.
